job_details.Vacaturetitel:
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
   * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
   * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
   * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
   * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
   * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP
job_details.full_text:
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping

As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
   * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
   * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
   * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
   * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
   * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes a broad range of engineering disciplines including back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, and data science, without a specific deep focus on any single area. While GenAI technologies are mentioned, the core responsibilities revolve around general software development, prototyping, and customer collaboration, rather than specialized Generative AI model development or MLOps. The role appears to be more about applying various technologies to solve customer problems through prototyping, fitting the description of a generalist role that might use AI tools rather than being a dedicated AI engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software' directly relates to the core activities of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions learning about 'their business challenges' and designing prototypes to solve them, indicating a need to understand the business context.
The phrase 'rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them' highlights the software development aspect focused on creating functional prototypes.
job_tasks.phrase: rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them

job_tasks.justification: Showcasing functionality in demos and seeing solutions deployed into production environments are part of the software development lifecycle and delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'machine learning, data science' suggests involvement in modeling tasks, though not specified as generative.
The mention of 'DevOps' indicates involvement in operational aspects of software and potentially ML systems.
The explicit mention of 'GenAI technologies' points to involvement in generative AI modeling.
The phrase 'Dive Deep to figure out the best approach' implies a problem-solving and analytical process often involved in modeling and solution design.
job_tasks.phrase: Dive Deep to figure out the best approach

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems' emphasizes the software development output and its customer-facing value.
job_tasks.phrase: The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems
